Image Search Gallery A WebApp that makes use of AI to find similar images in a sea fo images. The AI algorithms are deployed in a self-made Web-server and the whole app is hosted in Dockker Automated Attendance App App to recognize students in a class and mark their attendance. It also forwards the daily attendance record to a specified professor's mail. Watch Drone A WebApp designed to help people to search their favourite tv-shows and movies. It also lets them watch their trailers on Youtube.
) } export default Projects
